description:
Wenona is synonymous with bondage. She has worked with some of the best in the industry, and although I have shot her, this is the first time I get my hands on her. She is hyper flexible, tough as nails, and super hot and I am ready to see what all of the talk is about.
I start by getting her entire body tied to the floor, fully exposed and vulnerable. I have waited long enough to make her suffer, so I begin feeling her out. I'm not sure what she is capable of suffering through, but you can bet that I will find out and push her to that point.
Wenona is then stretched wide while standing and tied to a girder. The torment is relentless, and she is brought to her weakest point ever. She is terrified of the sadism she is suffering through.
Next she is suspended from one knee and inverted for the first time in her career. the pain continues as do the orgasms. This whore orgasms like she suffers...beautifully.
Finally she is put into a predicament that has all of her weight resting just on her knees. The torment continues, her suffering elevates, and her final orgasm with a crotch rope is mind blowing.
title: Destroying a Bondage Legend
